Gaining A New Skill
For example in Page1 the player has a set of choices and [Choice A] will lead to another page where there's a skill waiting. If the page is visited (if the player chooses [Choice A], the player will gain the skill, starting with +1. For example the skill is [Dance +1]. But if the player chooses either [Choice B] then the player gets no skill and will proceed with the game.

Adding Points to Current Skill
If the player for example earned [Dance +1] skill already, when they arrive in a certain page [Page3] and they have a series of choices again and they choose [Choice A] wherein if they choose that page it will add another point to their current skill. They'll have [Dance +2] now. Their stats will level up according to the page they visited/choose.
